name: Rock Paper Scissors: The Climb
description:
Rock Paper Scissors: The Climb

Basic rules of rock paper scissors is applied.

Rock Beats Scissors,
Paper beats Rock,
Scissors beats Paper

a or Arrow Left - Move Left
d or Arrow Right - Move Right
W or Space bar or Arrow Up -  Jump
N - Attack
ESC - back to main menu
F11 - Fullscreen

You can either attack left or right. When fighting the same object (like rock vs rock),  either the enemy or you have a chance at winning, You get score by destroying opponents. Every opponent you eliminate you turn into that object, example, if you are rock and you attack scissors then you turn into scissors.
